primary_trope.name: extreme_length
primary_trope.hook_text: Only a handful of races score 5/5 on Length. The Gralloch is one.
primary_trope.mechanism: Curiosity gap (specific) — knowing a perfect score exists but not why triggers dopamine anticipation.

beats.label: HOOK
beats.narration: Only a handful of races score 5/5 on Length. The Gralloch is one.
beats.text_on_screen: Only a handful of races score 5/5 on Length.
beats.editing_note: Pattern interrupt. Maximum visual stimulation. Text appears word-by-word (kinetic typography).
beats.psych_mechanism: Curiosity gap (specific) — knowing a perfect score exists but not why triggers dopamine anticipation.

beats.label: SETUP
beats.narration: The Gralloch. Scottish Highlands, Scotland. 124 mi.
beats.visual: Race card with location pin + route preview
beats.editing_note: Quick establishing shot. Show race card, then cut to route map or location footage.

beats.label: EVIDENCE
beats.narration: Length: 5 out of 5. Climate: 5 out of 5. Adventure: 5 out of 5.
beats.visual: Animated score cards — one per dimension
beats.editing_note: Each dimension gets 4-5 seconds. Visual change on EVERY score. Use Von Restorff: if any score is 5/5 or 1/5, isolate it visually (different color flash, avatar reaction shot).

beats.label: REVEAL
beats.editing_note: SILENCE for 0.5s before reveal (long-form technique adapted). Then: tier badge slams in. Avatar reaction. This is the Von Restorff moment — make it visually distinct.

beats.label: CTA + LOOP
beats.narration: Full breakdown. Free prep kit. Link in bio.
beats.editing_note: Design for LOOP: the final frame should visually connect back to the hook frame. On TikTok, seamless loops = replays = the strongest algorithmic signal.
beats.engagement_question: What race deserves a perfect Length score?

thumbnail_prompt: South Park style flat cutout character, dramatic pose, 'The Gralloch' bold text, tier badge 'ELITE', high contrast red/yellow/white, cycling gear, handlebar mustache --ar 16:9 --cref [CHARACTER_URL]

cross_platform_notes.tiktok: Post natively. Design for loop replay. Trending audio optional.
cross_platform_notes.instagram_reels: Same cut. Add location tag for race area.
cross_platform_notes.youtube_shorts: Same cut. Pin comment with link to full breakdown.
cross_platform_notes.twitter_x: Post thumbnail still + hot take as tweet text.
